work.name: INESC-ID, Lisbon, Portugal
work.summary: Currently working on the scraper that will collect data from the web via automated program synthesis.

work.name: INESC-ID, Lisbon, Portugal
work.summary: Formalized and implemented a symbolic fuzzer to generate security exploits for Node.js applications.
highlights: Submitted the paper “Automated Exploit Generation for Node.js Packages”, accepted at PLDI'25.

work.name: INESC-ID, Lisbon, Portugal
work.summary: Developed a reference interpreter for the 6th version of the JavaScript standard, which served as the foundation for a new symbolic execution tool for JavaScript.
